document.full_text: ashton kutcher's new other half, jon cryer, has opened up -- and giddily so -- about the changes rocking the set of his old cbs show.
document.title: jon cryer is 'jazzed' about future of 'two and a half men'
lines_and_colors: ashton kutcher's new other half, jon cryer, has opened up -- and giddily so -- about the changes rocking the set of his old cbs show.
